Question: At the initial position, you are asked to navigate to a small two-story house with a blue roof in the community below. When you reach your current location, what is the direction to the building directly below your starting location?  
choose:  
A. It is located on my upper right side.  
B. It is located on my upper rear side.  
C. It is located on my lower right side.  
D. It is located on my lower left side.  
E. It is located on my front side.

textgrad_result.init_answer: Option: C; Reason: From the initial position, the small two-story house with a blue roof is located on the lower right side when considering the direction directly below the starting location. The agent's movement and perspective confirm this positioning relative to the surrounding structures.

Therefore, the direction to the building directly below the starting location is on my lower left side.
